name: Steal Size
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Giant Hunter's Handbook © 2014, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (a piece of iron shaped like a scale tray)
text: This spell reduces the target's size by one size category, as if it were affected by reduce person. You grow in size by one category, as if affected by enlarge person (if you can be targeted by that spell). If the spell is dispelled or otherwise ends for either you or the target, both you and the target return to your normal sizes.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一块铁，形状如秤托盘)
target_zh: 一个大于你的类人生物
text_zh: 此法术减少目标的体型一阶段，如同受到缩小术(reduce person)的影响。你增大体型一阶段，如同受到变巨术(enlarge person)的影响。如果法术被解除，或是你或目标任一方以另外方式结束此法术，你与目标双方各自回到你们原本的体型。
